#summary Describes the app PenemuNXT Explorer Server
#labels Featured,Type-PC

= Introduction =

The serverapp [http://code.google.com/p/penemunxt/source/browse/#svn/trunk/PenemuNXTExplorerServer PenemuNXTExplorerServer] that communicates with the [ExplorerRobot], retrieves data and visualizes a map.

== Software ==

== Download ==
You can now download a preview of the app PenemuNXT Explorer Server from the [http://code.google.com/p/penemunxt/downloads/list download page].
It might be good to watch the screencast above first.

== Communication ==

Uses the [http://code.google.com/p/penemunxt/source/browse/#svn/trunk/PenemuNXTFramework PenemuNXTFramework] to communicate with the robot.
